name: Boot Sector: Variant
description:
This is a playable demo of a future Steam release called Boot Sector: Variant.

It is raw, not even alpha yet, just a demo that only works properly up to round 9, because the round 10 boss has not been created yet (although you can keep playing, but unexpected results occur).

NOTE: Saving/Loading does not work with Itch.io the way I have it set up. In my game, your save is in a folder created at save time, but on itch, the location of this folder always changes, and leads to weird bugs. I will not be implementing a save for the web version because this is just a demo and it's going to be a downloadable game once it's out. Sorry for the inconvenience, that means for now the parts shop won't work properly.

Updates:

It came to my attention that firewall and the heat exhaust were not properly hitting enemies, now they are properly hurting/burning enemies.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Dash in mouse direction

Right click - shoot RGBar

Left click hold and drag - Firewall

F - Change music

Instructions:

Unlock abilities by buying items for Bytes, which you pick up from defeated enemies.

Continuously dodge enemies set before you while destroying them.

Defeat the bosses and progress forward to the core of the problem...
